phases.description: Complete remaining planning skills and integration testing

tasks.title: Process.FindTopAndUpdate (Enhanced)
tasks.description: Identifies top-level requirements in hierarchies and updates them based on detailed analysis insights, domain modeling results, and process changes. Enhanced with orgModel consistency maintenance.

acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Successfully processes hierarchical requirements and updates parent requirements
Updates maintain coherence with organizational model structure

tasks.title: Plan.DeriveTasks
tasks.description: Convert analyzed requirements and goals into actionable development tasks with clear deliverables, acceptance criteria, dependencies, and task categorization

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Derives specific development tasks from requirements
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Generates structured task breakdown with clear descriptions
Task dependencies correctly identified and documented

tasks.title: Plan.EstimateEffort
tasks.description: Provides effort estimates for development tasks using multiple estimation methods including PERT, complexity analysis, and risk factors

acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: PERT, complexity, and analogy estimates implemented
Estimates include confidence intervals and detailed reasoning

tasks.title: Plan.BuildSchedule
tasks.description: Builds project schedules from estimated tasks using PERT analysis, resource allocation, and dependency management in markdown format

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Schedule generation from tasks and estimates
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Generates complete project schedule with critical path analysis
Identifies resource conflicts and provides resolution recommendations

risk_factors.mitigation: Use proven scheduling methodologies and validation

tasks.title: Integration & Testing
tasks.description: Complete skill integration testing and workflow validation across all 22 skills to ensure seamless operation

acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: All skill sequences work correctly from requirements to final outputs
Skills integrate smoothly within VS Code/Copilot environment

risk_factors.mitigation: Systematic testing approach and modular validation
Early integration testing and iterative refinement
